description: Dispute over whether items are fixtures or personal property
facts: George sold his house to Helen
The contract did not mention the custom-built bookshelf
The bookshelf is bolted to the wall and built into an alcove
George removed it before closing, claiming it was personal property
asp_facts: property_dispute(pd1). seller(pd1, george). buyer(pd1, helen). item(pd1, bookshelf). attachment_method(pd1, bolted). custom_built(pd1, yes). built_in(pd1, yes). contract_mention(pd1, no). removed_before_closing(pd1, yes).
question: Is the bookshelf a fixture that should remain with the property?
rationale: The three-part fixture test examines: (1) annexation - it's bolted; (2) adaptation - custom-built for the space; (3) intent - built-in suggests permanence. The bookshelf is a fixture and should convey with the property.
